```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(readxl)
library(reshape2)
library(ggplot2)

g <- read_excel("~/Documents/Experiments/8.22.25 tacGFPEcoli.xlsx", 
    sheet = "Lum")
h <- read_excel("~/Documents/Experiments/8.22.25 tacGFPEcoli.xlsx", 
    sheet = "OD")
i <- read_excel("~/Documents/Experiments/8.22.25 tacGFPEcoli.xlsx", 
    sheet = "Lum OD")

```

```{r Lum}
colors <- c("GFP" = "seagreen", "Blank" = "gray")

p1 <- ggplot(g, aes(x=Hours)) + 
  geom_line(aes(y = A1, color="GFP"),linewidth=1) +
  geom_line(aes(y = C1, color="GFP"),linewidth=1) +
  geom_line(aes(y = E1, color="GFP"),linewidth=1)+
  geom_line(aes(y = G1, color="GFP"),linewidth=1)+
  geom_line(aes(y = A3, color="GFP"),linewidth=1) +
  geom_line(aes(y = C3, color="GFP"),linewidth=1) +
  geom_line(aes(y = E3, color="GFP"),linewidth=1)+
  geom_point(aes(y = A1, color="GFP")) +
  geom_point(aes(y = C1, color="GFP")) +
  geom_point(aes(y = E1, color="GFP"))+
  geom_point(aes(y = G1, color="GFP"))+
  geom_point(aes(y = A3, color="GFP")) +
  geom_point(aes(y = C3, color="GFP")) +
  geom_point(aes(y = E3, color="GFP"))+
   labs(title="IPTG Lum",
        x ="Time (hours)", y = "Luminescence (AU)",
         color = "Legend") +
    scale_color_manual(values = colors)
p1
#ggsave("GFP Lum.png")

colors <- c("GFP" = "seagreen", "Blank" = "gray")

p1 <- ggplot(h, aes(x=Hours)) + 
  geom_line(aes(y = A1, color="GFP"),linewidth=1) +
  geom_line(aes(y = C1, color="GFP"),linewidth=1) +
  geom_line(aes(y = E1, color="GFP"),linewidth=1)+
  geom_line(aes(y = G1, color="GFP"),linewidth=1)+
  geom_line(aes(y = A3, color="GFP"),linewidth=1) +
  geom_line(aes(y = C3, color="GFP"),linewidth=1) +
  geom_line(aes(y = E3, color="GFP"),linewidth=1)+
  geom_point(aes(y = A1, color="GFP")) +
  geom_point(aes(y = C1, color="GFP")) +
  geom_point(aes(y = E1, color="GFP"))+
  geom_point(aes(y = G1, color="GFP"))+
  geom_point(aes(y = A3, color="GFP")) +
  geom_point(aes(y = C3, color="GFP")) +
  geom_point(aes(y = E3, color="GFP"))+
  scale_y_log10()+
   labs(title="OD",
        x ="Time (hours)", y = "Log OD",
         color = "Legend") +
    scale_color_manual(values = colors)
p1
#ggsave("GFP OD.png")
```

```{r}
r<- ggplot()+ 
  geom_point(data = data.frame(x = h$A1, y = g$A1), aes(x = x, y = y, color="GFP"))+
 geom_point(data = data.frame(x = h$C1, y = g$C1), aes(x = x, y = y, color="GFP"))+
  geom_point(data = data.frame(x = h$E1, y = g$E1), aes(x = x, y = y, color="GFP"))+
  geom_point(data = data.frame(x = h$G1, y = g$G1), aes(x = x, y = y, color="GFP"))+
   geom_point(data = data.frame(x = h$A3, y = g$A3), aes(x = x, y = y, color="GFP"))+
 geom_point(data = data.frame(x = h$C3, y = g$C3), aes(x = x, y = y, color="GFP"))+
  geom_point(data = data.frame(x = h$E3, y = g$E3), aes(x = x, y = y, color="GFP"))+
labs(title="IPTG OVL",
        x ="Optical Density", y = "Luminescence (AU)", color = "Legend") +
    scale_color_manual(values = colors)
r

#ggsave("GFP OVL.png")

```
